japanese:
（朝食のあと、あいつらに
　一花のことを話さないとな。
　もう想い出作りができるのは今日しかないんだ）
translation:
(I have to tell them about Ichika after breakfast.
 Today is the only day to make memories left.)

japanese: ん？　誰だ？
translation: Hm? Who is it?

japanese: おっはようございまーす！
translation: Good morning!

japanese: 朝からすみません。
translation: Sorry for bothering you so early.

japanese: もしかしてフータロー、寝起き？
translation: Have you just woken up, Futaro?

japanese: 寝癖、私が直してあげようか。
translation: I'll fix your bedhead.

japanese: な、なんだ、ぞろぞろと。
translation: Wh-what are you doing with those fingers?

japanese: なんだ、じゃないわ。
translation: Oh, don't give me that.

japanese: 一花と話はできたのですか？
translation: Were you able to talk to Ichika?

japanese: もしかしてまだ、話聞いてない？
translation: Perhaps you still haven't spoken with her?

japanese: い、いや、ちゃんと話はできたんだが……。
translation: N-no, I was able to talk to her...

japanese: あっ、もしかして口止めを……！
translation: Ah, did she perhaps tell you to stay quiet?!

japanese: なら、私たちが強引に聞き出したことにしていいわ。
translation: Then, we'll just force it out of you.

japanese: 早く話してフータロー。
translation: Hurry up and tell us, Futaro.

japanese: 島での生活は今日で最後なんですよ！
translation: This is our final day on the island!

japanese:
あー、わかったから離れてくれ！
こんなに詰め寄られたら話もできんだろ。
translation:
Aahh I got it, get away from me!
If you crowd in so close, I can't tell you.

japanese: あっ、ご、ごめん。
translation: Ah, s-sorry.

japanese:
で、だ。
結論から言うと一花から話は聞けた。
translation:
So, anyway.
In conclusion, I was able to hear things from Ichika.

japanese: で、私たちには言うなって口止めされたと。
translation: And she tells you to swear not to tell us.

japanese:
なんでそうなる。
口止めなんてされてない。
translation:
Why does that have to be the case?
She didn't make me swear not to tell you.

japanese: だったらどうして話してくれないんですか！
translation: In that case, why aren't you telling us?!

japanese: 俺に話す暇をくれなかったのはどこの誰だ。
translation: Who's the person not giving me time to speak?

japanese: あ、すみません……。
translation: Ah, excuse me...

japanese: そうですか、仕事のことで……。
translation: I see, it's related to her work...

japanese: なんで言ってくれないんだろ。
translation: I wonder why she didn't tell us.

japanese:
一花としては、俺たちに
余計な心配をさせたくないんだろう。
translation: I think Ichika doesn't want to make us worry too much.

japanese:
話したところで、俺たちにできることはない。
その事実が俺たちの負担になるんじゃないかと、
そういう風に考えてるんじゃないか？
translation:
From what she says, there's nothing we can do about it.
I bet she's thinking that her circumstances
will become our burden.

japanese: じゃあ、どうしたら……。
translation: So, what should we do...

japanese: そんなの決まってるじゃない。
translation: It's obvious, isn't it.

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
一花、もう起きてたわよね？
今頃はリビングかしら？
translation:
Ichika, you're awake, aren't you?
Are you in the living room?

japanese:
お、おい！　まさか！？
待て、二乃！
translation:
H-hey! You're not possibly?!
Wait, Nino!

japanese:
あ、みんな。
おはよー。
translation:
Ah, everyone.
Good mooorning!

japanese:
おはよう。
みんなそろって、どうしたの？
translation:
Good morning.
What are you all doing gathered here?

japanese:
おはよ、一花。
ちょっといい？
translation:
Morning, Ichika.
Can we have a second?

japanese:
ま、待ってください二乃！
まだ、みんなで話を……。
translation:
P-please wait, Nino!
We haven't finished talking together...

japanese: まどろっこしいのよ、そういうの。
translation: That's so frustratingly slow.

japanese:
ねえ一花、ストレートに言うわ。
事情はフー君から聞いた。
translation:
Hey Ichika, I'm gonna say it straight.
We heard what's going on from Fu-kun.

japanese:
……そっか。
心配させちゃってごめんね。
translation:
...Is that so.
I'm sorry for worrying you.

japanese:
一花、あんたは確かにプロだわ。
自分の働きでお金をもらって、私たちの生活を
支えてくれてる、立派な社会人よ。
translation:
Ichika, you are indeed a professional.
You're a respectable member of society
who's paid for her work and supports our lives as well.

japanese: それは褒めすぎだって。
translation: That's too much praise.

japanese:
仕事への責任感は立派だと思う。
私たちを心配させたくないという気持ちもわかるわ。
でも……。
translation:
I think your sense of responsibility for work
is admirable, and I understand
that you don't want us to worry. But...

japanese: みんなで、想い出を作りたいって言ったじゃない。
translation:
You said you wanted to make memories with all of us,
didn't you.

japanese:
……一花。
仕事のことを忘れて、とは言えません。
ですが、その……。
translation:
...Ichika.
We're not telling you to forget your work.
But, um...

japanese: ここで悩んでいても、結局、意味がない。
translation: It's meaningless, in the end, to worry about it here.

japanese: ……三玖までストレートに言うね。
translation: ...Even you're telling it straight, Miku.

japanese:
戻ったら、私たちみんなで、
一花の事務所にごめんなさいをしに行くよ。
translation:
When we get back,
we'll all go to Ichika's office to apologize.

japanese:
そうよ。
全部、不可抗力なの！
translation:
That's right.
We're a force of nature all together!

japanese:
島から出られなかったのも、
連絡が取れなかったのも、一花が悪いわけじゃない！
translation:
Not being able to leave the island
or get in contact with anyone isn't your fault, Ichika.

japanese: うん、そうなんだけどね……。
translation: Yes, that is true, but...

japanese: 賠償金が必要だったら、私が出す。
translation: If you need any compensation, I'll pay.

japanese: えっ！？
translation: HUH?!

japanese: もちろん私も出します。
translation: I will help out too, of course.

japanese:
私も！　バイト増やすから！
５つくらいならいけるよ、任せて！
translation:
Me too! I'll increase my part-time work!
I could still do five more jobs, so leave it to me!

japanese:
みんな……もう……。
お姉ちゃんを困らせないでよ……。
translation:
Everyone...come on...
Don't give your big sis any trouble...

japanese:
何がお姉ちゃんよ。
いつもはだらしないくせに、
こんなときだけ長女ぶるんじゃないわ。
translation:
What do you mean, big sis?
You're always so messy,
don't be acting like you're the eldest sister now.

japanese:
（……なるほどな。
　確かに俺が考えすぎてたのかもしれない）
translation:
(...I get it.
 I might have been thinking about things too much.)

japanese:
（これくらい正面からぶつかったほうが
　届く時だって、あるよな）
translation:
(There are times
 when it is better to hit it on the head,
 like this.)

japanese:
一花、そういうことだ。
こいつらは、お前を１人で悩ませる気はないらしい。
translation:
Ichika, that's how it is.
None of them wants you to worry by yourself.

japanese: うん、そうみたいだね。
translation: Yes, that's how it seems.

japanese: それで、何か言うことは？
translation: So, do you have something to say?

japanese:
黙っててごめん。
戻ったあと、困ったことがあったら、
みんなに思いっきり頼らせてもらうからね。
translation:
I'm sorry for staying quiet.
When we get back, if there's something troubling me,
I'll rely on you all, without holding back.

japanese: うん、よし。
translation: Alright, good.

japanese: 力になりますから。
translation: We'll be your strength.

japanese: お姉ちゃんのために頑張る！
translation: We'll do our best for you, big sis!

japanese:
みんな、本当に仲良しなんだね。
いいなぁ五つ子って。
translation:
You guys get along so well.
Quintuplets, how nice.

japanese:
（確かに、こいつら以外には
　できない解決方法だな……）

ふう！
みんなに話してスッキリしたら、
なんだかすっごく、お腹すいてきちゃった。
translation:
Whew!
I feel refreshed after talking to everyone,
so I'm like, really hungry.

japanese:
朝ご飯できてるよ！
あとはテーブルに並べるだけ！
translation:
Breakfast is made!
All we have to do is set the table.

japanese: では、みんなで準備してしまいましょう。
translation: Then, let's all get it ready together.

japanese: （いや、解決したんだろうか？）
translation: (Well, I wonder if it is actually solved.)

japanese: ズルくて、ごめんね。
translation: Sorry for decieving you all.

japanese:
（あのときの笑顔がどうにも引っかかる。
　ズルいって、一体何を指して言ったんだ？）
translation:
(The smile on her face at that time caught my attention.
 what the hell did she mean by 'deceiving'?)

japanese: フータロー？
translation: Futaro?

japanese: あ、ああ、俺も行くよ。
translation: Y-yeah, I'm going too.
